'''Kenneth Campbell "Ken" Stott''' is a Scottish actor. He portrayed [[Balin]] in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]]''. He is best known as DCI Red Metcalfe in ''[[wikipedia:Messiah (TV series)|Messiah]]''.

==Filmography==
* [[2012]]-[[2014]]: [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]: [[Balin]]
